ASN290.name: Independent Study
ASN290.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ASN290.description: Special projects in an Asian Languages arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
ASN290.restrictions: Open to freshmen. Approval of department.

ASN291.name: Special Topics in Asian Languages
ASN291.description: Special topics supplementing regular course offerings proposed by faculty on a group study basis.

ASN352.name: Readings in Asian/Asian American/Asian Diaspora Literature and Visual Culture
ASN352.description: Extensive reading of texts by Americans of Asian descent or by Asians in English or English translation. Attention to artistic, historical, and cultural contexts.
ASN352.prerequisite: Completion of Tier I Writing Requirement

ASN490.name: Independent Study
ASN490.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ASN490.description: Special projects in Asian Languages arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
ASN490.restrictions: Open to seniors. Approval of department.

ASN491.name: Special Topics in Asian Languages
ASN491.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ASN491.description: Special topics supplementing regular course offerings proposed by faculty on a group study basis.
ASN491.restrictions: Open to seniors. Approval of department.
